tool.name: OGS: createRaster
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createRaster'.
tool.command: createRaster #if str($n_rows): --n_rows '$n_rows' #end if #if str($n_cols): --n_cols '$n_cols' #end if #if str($cell_size): --cell_size '$cell_size' #end if #if str($ll_y): --ll_y '$ll_y' #end if #if str($ll_x): --ll_x '$ll_x' #end if --output output_1.asc

param.name: ll_y
param.label: ll y
param.help: y coordinate of lower left point of axis aligned rectangular region

param.name: ll_x
param.label: ll x
param.help: x coordinate of lower left point of axis aligned rectangular region

tool.help: This tool runs the **createRaster** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
